divs: Sighting Detailsmy sister called me and told me to go look over the Colorado monument that there was two red lights. so I went out and saw one light that was bright red. I could tell it was over the horizon and was not a car. I was looking further west for the second light when she told me the first light shot another light out of it that went across the sky.then when I looked back at the light it started to fade then disappeared.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Fruita
There was one other sighting in Fruita on or around January 6th 2012
